settings.code:
Our Locations

We currently have two locations in Southern California and we'd love for you to visit!

One in Old Town Tustin, located in South Orange County and the other in Huntington Beach, right along the famous Pacific Coast Highway.

We'd love for you stop by and say hi to any of our amazing team members and be inspired or find your next cute outfit.

settings.subtitle: OLD TOWN
settings.title: TUSTIN
settings.text:
330 El Camino Real, Tustin, CA 92780

Come visit our unique cafe and boutique concept located in the heart of Old Town Tustin. Stop in for a dress, skirt, or cute top and leave with our irresistable Lavender Latte! Stay for some tea and catching up, or treat yourself to alone time and some retail therapy. Our cafe/boutique is peaceful, inspiring, and welcoming!

www.morninglavendercafe.com
714-486-1429

settings.title: HUNTINGTON BEACH
settings.text:
Located on the 1st floor of Pacific City Mall.

21034 Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 108

Come visit our newest boutique by the beach! Our team is ready to welcome you and help you find your next cute outfit for going out, a special occasion, or just everyday wear! Free parking validation in the garage.

www.morninglavender.com
714-369-2577
